name: Beautiful Brittany Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
Be part of 700 years of history!
The Chateau estate was the home of a powerful seignory from the beginning of the 13th century.
It is at the heart of a 30 hectare estate and at the water’s edge of a small lake. It is situated in Brittany on the west coast of France.
The reception rooms are situated in the central section of the Chateau. They communicate with each other and give access to the outside terraces through large French windows thus allowing your guests to take advantage of the park. There is also a chapel on site for your service to take place.
The terraces and lawns can easily accommodate cocktails and outside buffets as well as any tent or marquee extension.
The reception rooms can accommodate up to 200 seated guests but this number can be significantly increased by adding outside extensions.
Many options are at your disposal to personalize your reception. For example, a fireworks display can be shot on the lakes or the newly weds can arrive by horse carriage. A lake arrival by rowing boat can also be arranged. Musical animations, such as jazz or traditional Celtic music, are also possible.
Our catering services are taken care of by a professional caterer. Edouard and the Chateau have created a partnership whereby clients of the chateau obtain preferential rates, please do ask for more information.
We can accommodate up to 20 Guests on-site in 10 double bedrooms: 5 in the castle and 5 in the Castle’s adjoining farm only a few hundred feet away. In the farm: 5 double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms; in the castle 5 bedrooms: 2 large suites with en-suite bathrooms and 3 bedrooms with a shared bathroom.
We welcome any suggestions from your part so don’t hesitate to tell us what you would like! Many variations are available to make your day unique.
Nearest airport: Nantes (50Km) or Paris CDG (2hrs 30 by TGV)
additional_info:
